General.Name: Bystronic AG
General.Description: Bystronic AG, through its subsidiaries, provides metal processing solutions for cutting, bending, and automation worldwide. The company offers laser cutting, laser automation, press brakes, bending automation, and tube laser cutting solutions. It also provides 360 customer advisor, customer training, parts and consumables, press brake tools, and life cycle management services, as well as software solution. The company was formerly known as Conzzeta AG and changed its name to Bystronic AG in May 2021. Bystronic AG was founded in 1912 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.
